name: Atomic Attack
description:
Atomic Attack is a fun, educational game which is based around the creation of a single atom. 

It shows the make-up of atoms and the process of making them and the game is all about doing it in a fun, efficient way. There are obstacles on your journey so not everything is so simple, anti-quarks and neurons love to sabotage your mission. 

Battle your way through the waves of anti-quarks whilst maintaining your electron count and keeping your element balanced. Have fun playing!
